headline: Simon速 Promotes Stanley Shashoua to President of International Real Estate
summary: Simon速, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced that Stanley Shashoua has been promoted to President of International Real Estate.
